title: Encounters With The Paranormal: Personal Tales of the Supernatural
description: Almost everyone has a ghost story. Real people. Real stories.  Read about haunted houses and vehicles, experiences during paranormal investigations, visits from relatives that have passed on, pets reacting to the paranormal, psychic experiences, and conversations with full-bodied apparitions.  ENCOUNTERS WITH THE PARANORMAL reveals personal stories of the supernatural, exploring the realm beyond the veil through the eyes of a colorful cast of contributors.  Contributors include: Mike Ricksecker, Amelia Cotter, Rob Gutro, Cathy E. Gasch, Kathy Chruszcz, Heather Bise, Kyle Mecca, Al Willen, Vanessa Hogle, Deb Lerew, Dennis Lewis, Tammy Merritt-Beaghan, Ne"cole Nohealani Vidro, Nadine Leder, AnnMarie Barrett, Anney Horn, and Ross Lightfoot.
author: Mike Ricksecker
